en.title: Complete Web Development
en.text: Successfully completed the [[Complete Web Development]] course from Programming Hero. The rigorous curriculum included in-depth studies of JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and React. During the course, I successfully completed three projects in React and was recognized for performing among the top 5% of the class. This experience honed my skills as a hard-working, dedicated, and quick learner, consistently completing assigned tasks on time.

en.title: {{Next Level}} Web Development
en.text: I have successfully completed the [[Next Level Web Development]] course from Programming Hero, which provided an advanced understanding of web development concepts. The course covered topics such as Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and advanced React techniques. Throughout the course, I worked on several projects that enhanced my practical skills and deepened my knowledge of full-stack development.

en.title: {{Industry Automation}}
en.text: PLC Programming (S7-200, S7-300, S7-1200), VFD, HMI, AutoCAD Electrical (2D) - Completed an intensive course on Industry Automation that covered PLC programming using Siemens S7 series, VFD configuration, HMI design, and AutoCAD Electrical for 2D schematics. The course provided hands-on experience with TIA Portal, SIMATIC Manager, MicroWIN, GX Works2, WinCC Flexible, and simulation tools like S7-PLCSIM and Factory I/O.

en.title: {{ Finalist – IEEE YESIST12 2025 }} – Special Track
en.text: Selected as a finalist for the IEEE YESIST12 2025 under the Special Track . Abstract titled [[Intelligence Safeguard]] stood out among 1000+ global submissions. The final round will be held physically at IEEE UKM Student Branch, Malaysia. Team ID: ST25P1738133. But we have not enough fund to attend the final round which was held in Malaysia.
